body.p:
Felicity, O. April 20th 1863
James W. Tate Esqr
Dear Sir

Please find Enclosed Five Dollars Also a Certified Copy of the Affidavits Endorsed on my Affi Commission as Commissioner of Deeds for your State. I feel Greatful to you Mr Marshall & the Governor for your kindness. Excuse me for the want of promptness in this and I assure you I shall Give you no cause of complaint in future

Ohio
Oath of P. H. Hastings
Comr of Deeds
Filed Apr 22d 1863.
